channel.title: Prince losing executes to MM
channel.description:
#### What happened? I executed the MM night 3 and lost all my executes.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? I should've had 2 executes left
#### Steps to reproduce: Jail MM night 3 while he's still showing up as BD
#### Comments: I'm still very new to the game, but I jailed a princess claim n3 after hearing from a drunk n2 that they were occ immune. No-one in my game was sure why I was out of executes, but best guess is that it's because MM is shown as BD for the first 3 nights. Not sure if intended or not.

item.title: Prince losing executes to MM
item.dc:creator: Sixation
item.description:
That’s good to hear. I wish I had saved screenshots and logs, but I didn’t think of it at the time.

Read full topic

item.title: Prince losing executes to MM
item.dc:creator: Wolfy
item.description:
Even of he was immune to detection and with you executing him, you should not have lost your executes since you executed member of the Unseen and not the Blue Dragon.

Sixation:

but best guess is that it’s because MM is shown as BD for the first 3 nights. Not sure if intended or not.

This should definitely not be intended as Mastermind being seen as “Not Suspicious” has nothing to do with the Prince.

Read full topic

item.title: Prince losing executes to MM
item.dc:creator: Sixation
item.description:
No, he was actually MM. End game screen confirmed it.

Read full topic
